summary: TRANSMISSION PROBLEMS WITH 1996 MAZDA 626:  MAZDA HAS A VERY HIGH FAILURE RATE ON THE AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSIONS IN THE MAZDA 626 VEHICLES.  MY CAR IS ON THE SECOND TRANSMISSION AND PROBABLY NEEDS A THIRD.  I BELEIVE THAT MAZDA SHOULD FIX THE PROBLEM WITHOUT COST TO THE OWNER.    THANKS FOR LISTENING  GARY
